net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security

Interface Roles


  • public interface Roles
    List of predefined roles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String GLOBAL_ADMINISTRATOR
      List of global roles
      static java.lang.String GLOBAL_AUTOMATION 
      static java.lang.String GLOBAL_CONTROLLER 
      static java.lang.String GLOBAL_CREATOR 
      static java.lang.String GLOBAL_READ_ONLY 
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> GLOBAL_ROLES 
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_MANAGER
      The project manager can promote existing builds, manage the validation stamps, manage the shared build filters and edit some properties.
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_OWNER
      The project owner is allowed to all functions in a project, but for its deletion.
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_PARTICIPANT
      A participant in a project is allowed to change statuses in validation runs.
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_PROMOTER
      The promoter can promote existing builds.
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_READ_ONLY
      This role grants a read-only access to all components of the projects.
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> PROJECT_ROLES 
      static java.lang.String PROJECT_VALIDATION_MANAGER
      The validation manager can manage the validation stamps.
